title: Was the name of former Trump consultant Carl Aikan, who disposed of millions in stock before steel tariffs, announced?
subtitle: The billionaire investor and the regulatory reform adviser insist at one time that Trump was not aware in advance of President Trump ' s advertising.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The billionaire investor and former Trump consultant Carl Ekan sold approximately $30 million worth of shares in a steel-dependent company in the weeks prior to the President ' s declaration of tariffs on steel imports.
